text: Iṉṉum niṉaivu kūṟuṅkaḷ; ḥpir'avṉiṉ kūṭṭattāriṭamiruntu nām uṅkaḷaik kāppāṟṟiṉōm; avarkaḷ uṅkaḷukkuk koṭiya vētaṉaikaḷaik koṭuttuk koṇṭiruntārkaḷ; avarkaḷ uṅkaḷ āṇ makkaḷaik kolai ceytuviṭṭu, (uṅkaḷaic ciṟumaippaṭuttuvataṟkāka) uṅkaḷ peṇ makkaḷai uyiruṭaṉ vāḻaviṭṭārkaḷ; itil uṅkaḷukku uṅakaḷ iṟaivaṉiṭamiruntu oru perum cōtaṉai ēṟpaṭṭiruntatu
